game_description: {Game Instructions} Object: Go through a course to the finish line with a rod. Course: Made up with metal frames in which an electric current flows. Game Play: Control the rod not to touch metal frames. Note: If you push or pull the rod in order to skip the middle of courses, the game is over.
Languages: English, Chinese (China), Chinese (Taiwan), French (France), German, Japanese, Spanish (Mexico)
review_2: Love this game. An old-fashioned game of years ago turned into a VR game. I bought this the first day it was available. A week later I was still the only American on the leader boards. Only two people made it on the hard leaderboards and NO ONE has made it on the "impossible" leaderboards. You will LOVE testing your steadiness, skills, and patience. WHY IS THIS GAME NOT BEING SOLD IN THE OCULUS STORE?
